text: Outwood Academy Bydales (previously named Bydales School) is a secondary school in Marske-by-the-Sea, England which has about 750 students. A new school building was opened on 2 November 2006. It is rated as 'outstanding' by Ofsted. It is a technology college. The school has a small wind turbine, solar panels and a hydrogen fuel cell. In 2015, the school changed to academy status and was named Outwood Academy Bydales. ==References== == Other websites == *The school's website Category:Schools in England
title: Outwood Academy Bydales
